nodes.text: A droidsmith, also spelled Droid-smith, was a craftsperson who specialized in the creation, repair, and modification of droids. The Anzellan Babu Frik was a skilled droidsmith who worked with the smuggler gang known as the Spice Runners of Kijimi out of a workshop on the planet Kijimi. Another droidsmith built the droid D-O, but was killed by the Sith assassin Ochi, who stole D-O.
